title: My login and Pass now associates with a different account...
body:
So i typed in my login and pass that I've BEEN using for years, instead of taking me to the account that i've always played on (calmdafuqdown). it takes me to this (PdNaCO) lvl1 acc with absolutely nothing. 
see the images below, note that my email from riot was from 2014... 
also I can spent over 150$ and so much time on my account.. 
https://imgur.com/TF1tI81
https://imgur.com/2mpWBuo
https://imgur.com/a/eozqu

replies.body: Hey there again PdNaCO! Sorry you're having so much trouble finding that other account. It looks like you're still using the wrong username to login to the level 30 account you have, but no worries. I've got an account specialist grabbing your ticket right now, so you'll have a response soon and should be able to figure things out!
yeah thank you so much, I'm just stressed out. I can provide anything to prove that i'm the owner of the lvl30 account.
